verses.content: Hieng thilhai hnunga lal Ahasuer lunginsenna chu a hung rê hnunga chun, Vasti le a thilthaw le, a chunga thupêk um chu a hriet zing a.
Chun, lal siehlaw ama rawng- bâwltu chun thurawt a siem a, “Lal ta ding hin nunghâk tleirawl hmêl ṭhahai zawng ni raw se.

Susa khawpuia nuhmeihai inah hieng nunghâk tleirawl hmêl ṭhahai po po hung ṭhuoi khâwm dingin lal hin a rambung sûng po poa dingin hotuhai ruot bawk sien. Anni chu nuhmeihai kawltu, lal mitillâk Hegai enkawlna hnuoiah sie ni hai sien; chun, incheimawina hmangruohai pêk ni bawk hai sien.
Chun, nunghâk lal suklungâwitu chu Vasti aiah lalnu hung ni raw se,” tiin. Chu thil chun lal chu a suklâwm a, chuong ang tak chun a thaw tah a.
Susa khawpuia chun Juda mi, a hming Mordekai, Benjamin mi Kis naupa, Simei naupa, Jair naupa chu a um a;
ama chu Juda lal Jehoiakin ruola Babulon lal Nebukadnezzarin a ṭhuoi hmang sal intânghai ruola Jerusalema inthawka ṭhuoi hmang a ni veh a.

Ama chun a pami naunu Hadassa, chu chu Esther a nih, chu a châwmlien a, amanu chun nu ama- nih, pa amani khawm a nei si nawh a; chu nunghâk chu hmêl ṭha ditumtak a na; chuongchun, a nu le a pa an thi chun Mordekai chun ama naunu dingin a lâk a nih.

Chuongchun, lal thupêk le a thu sukthlûk chu hriet a na, nunghâk tamtakhai chu Susa khawpuia Hegai enkawlna hnuoia chun ṭhuoi khâwm an ni phing chun, nuhmei enkawltu Hegai enkawlna hnuoiah lal ina chun Esther khawm chu ṭhuoi a ni ve tah a.

Chu nunghâk chun ama chu a suklâwm a, a lungsietna chu a hlaw tah a; lal chun incheimawina hmang- ruohai le a fâk ding chanpuol chu lal ina mi nunghâk thlang suok pasari leh inhmawtakin a pêk a; nuhmeihai in hmun ṭhatna taka chun ama le a nunghâkhai chu a sie tah a.
Esther chun a chihai le a lai- bunghai khawm ân hriettir nawh a; Mordekai chun inhriettir lo dingin a khap sih a.
Chun, Esther chu ieng angin am a thawh a, ieng am a chang a ti hre dingin, nuhmei in tuol puoa chun Mordekai chu ni tin hin a fe hlak a.

Nunghâk chu lal Ahasuer kuom- a a lût hun a tlung hma chun nuhmei- hai ta dinga incheimawina hun ruot thla sâwmpahni a hmang zo ding a na, thla ruk sûng chu mura hriek leh, thla ruk dang chu riminhnik danghai leh.
Chun, nunghâk chu lal kuoma a lût dân ding chu hieng ang hi a nih: lal ina va fe dinga nuhmeihai ina a dit zâwng taphawt chu chawi dinga pêk a na.

Zântieng chun chutaka chun fêng a ta, zingkâr chun nuhmeihai in pahnina, thaikêmhai enkawltu, lal mitillâk Saasgaz enkawlna hnuoia chun hung kîr a ta. Lal chu a chungah a lâwm nawh a, a hminga a ko naw chun lal kuoma chun a kîr nâwk ta ngainaw ding a nih.

Chuongchun, a naunu dinga ama enkawltu Mordekai pami Abi- hail naunu Esther ta dinga lal kuoma lût hun a hung tlung chun, ieng- khawm a ngên nawh a, nuhmeihai enkawltu, lal mitillâk Hegaiin a ruotpêkhai chau naw chu.
Chun, a hmu taphawthai mit- hmuah Esther chun ditsakna a hlawh a. Chuongchun, a rorêl kum sarina. Tebeth thla, thla sâwmnaa chun, a lal inah, lal Ahasuer kuoma chun Esther chu ṭhuoi lût a ni tah a.

Chuongchun, nuhmei danghai po po nêkin lal chun Esther chu a ditzâwng a, nunghâk po pohai nêk chun a mithmua chun lunginsietna le ditsak a hlaw nasa lem a; chuong- chun, a lua chun lallukhum ân khumtir a, Vasti aia chun lalnuah a siem tah a.
Chun, lal chun a lalhai le a siehlawhai po po ta dingin, ruoi ropuitak, Esther ruoiṭhe, chu a siem tah a, rambunghai ta dingin châwl a siem a, lal tiktlâina ang peiin lâwm- manhai khawm a pêk bawk a.
Nunghâkhai an hung inkhâwm a vawihninaa chun Mordekai chu lal kul kawtkhâra chun a ṭhung a,
Esther chun a sûnghai le a hnam khawm a la hrillang nawh a, Mordekai chun a khap leiin; ama a umpui lai ang bawk khan Esther chun Mordekai thu chu a awi sih a.
Chuong nihaia Mordekai chu lal in kawtkhâra a ṭhung lai chun, mi tillâk pahni, Bigthan le Teres, kawt- khâr vêngtuhai chu an lunginsen a, lal Ahasuer chunga kut thlâkna ding an zawng a.
Chu thil chu Mordekai chun a lo hriet a, ama chun lalnu Esther kuoma chun ân hriettir a; chuong- chun, Esther chun Mordekaia hming chun lal chu a hril tah a.

Chuonga chu thu chu dâwp- suokna siem a hung ni chun, chuong ang ngei chu a ni ti hmusuok a ni tah a, anni chu thinga khai hlum an ni ve ve tah a; chun, lal hmaa chun lal chanchin ziekna bua chun ziek a ni nghe ngheh a.
